thread.title: Free three month trial of Amazon Cloud Drive
thread.title_full: Free three month trial of Amazon Cloud Drive - Sun Sentinel

author: Doreen Christensen
title: Free three month trial of Amazon Cloud Drive
text:
Get a free three-month trial on Amazon Cloud Drive. Choose from two plans.
After the trial ends, the first service offers unlimited photo storage and 5 GB of video storage for $11.99 a year.
Not enough space? Then try Amazon Cloud Drive Unlimited for three months for free. It will house all your photos, videos and documents for $59.99 per year.
In October, Apple dropped monhtly cloud prices to 99 cents for 50 GB of space, 200 GB for $2.99 or 1 TB for $9.99.
Like music, Amazon charges up to 40 percent less. Plus, Prime members get unlimited photo storage, among other benefits, for free with a $99 a year membership fee.
Click here for the deal.
At war with AT&T over data throttling Doreen Christensen AT&T put me in the time-out chair.
Again.
My wireless carrier, now affectionately known as the Death Star, punished my data-hogging ways by lowering my blazing-fast 4G LTE connection on my super-smart Apple iPhone 6.
This slowing of high-speed broadband connections is known as throttling. Carriers...
